lead_paragraph: MARSHALL--Cynthia, of Manhattan, passed away peacefully on March 14, 2016 at Mount Sinai Hospital. She was a retired advertising executive. Services will be held on March 22 at Benta's Funeral Home, 630 St. Nicholas Avenue, New York, NY. Viewing at 11am with services following at noon. 1/3
